hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors
### This will add higherClassification in taxon.tab. And rebuild the DwCA. ### globi_assoc has parentNameUsageID field but doesn't have any values, it's blank. So we use ancestry to compute for hC #php dwca_utility.php _ '{"resource_id": "globi_assoc", "task": "gen_hC_using_ancestry"}'
### This use gnparser one name at a time. Not entire file. #php run_gnparser_dwca.php _ '{"resource_id": "globi_assoc-with-hC"}' #OK gen neo4j_1
### Start matching taxa: #php match_taxa_2DH.php _ '{"resource_id": "globi_assoc-with-hC"}' #OK gen neo4j_2
### Convert taxon.tab, use EOLid value for taxonID. ### REMINDER: Multiple scinames with different taxonIDs have the same canonical thus will have the same EOLid #php use_EOLid_as_taxonID.php _ '{"resource_id": "globi_assoc-with-hC"}' # gen neo4j_3
### rename cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/applications/content_server/resources_3 cp globi_assoc-with-hC_neo4j_3.tar.gz GloBI_TraitBank_1_0.tar.gz ls -lt globi_assoc-with-hC_neo4j_3.tar.gz ls -lt GloBI_TraitBank_1_0.tar.gz rm -f globi_assoc-with-hC_neo4j_3.tar.gz
### Generate CSV files for Neo4j: OK cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors php generate_csv_4neo4j.php _ '{"resource_id": "GloBI_TraitBank_1_0"}' #latest
